description: SoundCannon Soundboard is the premier soundboard application for WebOS. This soundboard currently includes sounds like rim shot, drum roll, crickets, computers, cows, squeaky gears, gongs, guns and glory. SoundCannon has 25 different awesome sound effects that you can use to help lower tension and mainly to have fun. A random button allows you to play a random sound, also we have included a timer for you to setup a sneak attack on all of your friends, family and coworkers. We have a major sound update planned for after the memory limit is fixed, also price might increase on next update so get it now!
